Hi @, what are you doing here?$h#$b#Funny how we run into each other all the time.$h"/emote farmer 8/pause 1500/speak Yri "Say... Do you know anything about these ruins?"/emote farmer 8/pause 1500/faceDirection Yri 0/pause 250/speak Yri "Don't worry, nobody really knows anything about it.$h"/pause 500/move Yri 2 0 0/pause 500/faceDirection Yri 1/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/faceDirection Yri 2/pause 500/faceDirection Yri 3/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/move Yri -2 0 2/faceDirection farmer 0/emote Yri 12/pause 1500/speak Yri "Once this must have been a temple, but it looks like it fell to ruins.#$b#There was a war thousands of years ago, it destroyed most of Ferngill...many people lost their lives.$s#$b# So... Maybe nobody was alive to take care of the temple anymore?$s#$b# So many died but... You know...Those who survived lost so much more.$s#$b#The people that survived... They lost their friends and families but also their homes, cultural landmarks, places of worship and places to rest.$s#$b# Everything they build for themselves, their families and their community was lost or in ruins.$s"/pause 100/emote Yri 40/pause 1500/faceDirection Yri 0/pause 150/speak Yri "War is gruesome... War destroys the legacy of the people who once lived peacefully, just as we do now.$s#$b#...$s#$b#Right now people lose their lives, their family, their homes...$s"/pause 100/move Yri -2 0 0/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 150/speak Yri "...$s#$b#Sorry. I ruined the mood.$s#$b#I'm sure you didn't come here to listen to all that nonsense I just spewed.$h#$b#I think I should go and do something productive to lift my spirits up again.#$b#...See you, @!$h"/move Yri 0 4 1 true/faceDirection farmer 2/move Yri 9 0 1/faceDirection farmer 1/move Yri 7 0 0 true/pause 400/globalFade/viewport -999 -999/end

It's late...$10"/pause 100/emote farmer 40/pause 1500/faceDirection Yri 3/speak Yri "I needed some fresh air so I took Nala for a walk.$10#$b#....$10#$b#Hey @, have you ever had a nightmare that felt so real that you woke up as scared as if it had really happened?$10"/quickQuestion ...?#Yes, I know how you feel... Do you want to talk about it?#No, I've never had a nightmare like that. But I can listen if you like.#I'm actually on my way home. I don't have the time to listen to you.(break)speak Yri "...$10#$b#I dreamt that my father got very sick...$10#$b#He couldn't leave his bed anymore and couldn't speak.$10#$b#I tried talking to him and holding his hand...$10"\faceDirection Yri 1\faceDirection Nala 1\speak Yri "...but his body was ice cold and his eyes were cloudy and lifeless...$9#$b#I was so desperate to wake him and I cried out for him but nothing worked...$9#$b#...When I woke up, I checked my phone and called my parents. I was so relieved when my father answered the phone.$10#$b#I didn't tell him what happened but hearing his voice brought me peace....$10#$b#....$10#$b#....I'm sorry, @...I just need some time alone... Thanks for listening to me.$10"(break)speak Yri "...$10#$b#I dreamt that my father got very sick...$10#$b#He couldn't leave his bed anymore and couldn't speak.$10#$b#I tried talking to him and holding his hand...$10"\faceDirection Yri 1\faceDirection Nala 1\speak Yri "...but his body was ice cold and his eyes were cloudy and lifeless...$9#$b#I was so desperate to wake him and I cried out for him but nothing worked...$9#$b#...When I woke up, I checked my phone and called my parents.
